Your GetCreamSelection should return the String  
  

      public string GetCreamSelection()
        {
            string creamOrNot;
            if (cream)
            {
                creamOrNot = "Cream";
            }
            else
            {
                creamOrNot = "No Cream";
            }
            return creamOrNot;
        }
